channel.title: UglyFeed
channel.description: The ugliest, funniest news you'll ever read!

item.title: Man Wins Lawsuit Against Himself, Receives $1
item.description: A local man sued himself for emotional distress and won a symbolic $1, sparking debates about self-inflicted legal battles.

item.title: Cat Elected Mayor, Declares Fish Day
item.description: A cat named Whiskers has been elected mayor, and his first decree is to declare every Friday as Fish Day.

item.title: Invisible Art Exhibit Leaves Critics Speechless
item.description: An art exhibit featuring invisible paintings has left critics speechless, questioning the very nature of art itself.

item.title: World's Largest Pizza Causes Citywide Feeding Frenzy
item.description: The world's largest pizza was delivered by helicopter, causing a citywide feeding frenzy and countless selfies.

item.title: Robot Presidential Candidate Vows to End Human Error
item.description: A robot named RoboBob has announced its candidacy for president, promising to eliminate human error and bring order.

item.title: Man Breaks World Record for Most Socks Worn at Once
item.description: A man has broken the world record by wearing 200 pairs of socks at once, waddling his way into the history books.

item.title: Local Library Adds Sleeping Pods for Readers
item.description: A local library has added sleeping pods for readers who find the books too relaxing, turning the library into a nap haven.

item.title: Duck Army Takes Over Park, Declares Independence
item.description: A flock of ducks has taken over a local park, declaring it an independent duck nation, complete with pond parades.

item.title: Man Builds Backyard Roller Coaster, Neighbors Demand Rides
item.description: A man has built a roller coaster in his backyard, leading to a surge of neighborly demands for joyrides.

item.title: World's First Flying Bicycle Takes to the Skies
item.description: Inventors have unveiled the world's first flying bicycle, soaring above traffic and stunning onlookers below.
